Suppress Noon of Violet entities in 'Normal' and 'Hard' difficulties from the Noon of Violet Ordeal.

Earn various rewards by clearing these missions.
The Dawn of Violet

To gain an understanding of what is incomprehensible, they dream, staring.

They complied with nothing in their bid to understand. They simply did so.
Clear Easy Difficulty to Unlock
The Noon of Violet
Grant Us Love
We could only hear the weakest and faintest of their acts. We sought for love and compassion from them.
The Noon of Violet
Grant Us Love
We cannot understand them, nor will they understand us.
The Dawn of Violet
The Dawn of Green
The Noon of Violet Event
The 4th Walpurgis Night - The Noon of Violet
[The 4th Walpurgis Night - The Noon of Violet] unlocks regardless of your progress in the Main Story. Enter via the event banner on the Window or the Driverside tabs.
Event Period
The duration of The 4th Walpurgis Night event is shown here. During the event, complete Missions for Easy and Hard difficulty event Encounters and claim their rewards.
Easy Difficulty Encounter

Select the door to begin the Easy difficulty Encounter. The Encounter consumes an Enkephalin Module upon entry. On Easy difficulty, any Deployed Identities under Level 45 will be raised to Level 45. Also, any Deployed Identities and E.G.O under Tier 3 Uptie/Threadspinning Level will be raised to Tier 3 Uptie Level.
Hard Difficulty Encounter
Clearing the Easy difficulty Encounter unlocks the Hard difficulty. In Hard difficulty, your Identities' current Levels, Uptie Tiers, and E.G.O Threadspinning Tiers will be reflected.
Training Team Captain Effects

The #1 Sinner to be deployed in the Teams menu will be imbued with the 'Training Team Captain' effect. The Sinner with the 'Training Team Captain' effect will gain more Slots and other beneficial effects.
Missions
You can enter the [Missions] page, where you can view the list of Missions to be completed during the Encounter and their rewards.
You can view the Reward Exchange period in the [Missions] page.
Easy difficulty and Hard difficulty each has different sets of Missions to complete.
Complete these Missions and claim various rewards from the [Missions] page.

Even after the event fully ends, you will be able to experience the 'The 4th Walpurgis Night - The Noon of Violet' combat Encounters and view its story anytime at the Driverside and Theater - [Detour Tales].
